content: give yourself the gift of extra time with a merry make-ahead this year s summer crochet along is all about indulging in those fulfilling festive projects that might take more time to work up without the pressure of the holiday countdown mikey s study of christmas cookies blanket captures the whimsy and nostalgia of holiday memories with stunning stitch-work and a festive palette of red heart soft to keep you engaged materials red heart® soft™ 5 oz/141 g 256 yds/234 m contrast a off white 4601 1 ball contrast b rose blush 9770 1 ball contrast c turquoise 2515 1 ball contrast d really red 9925 1 ball contrast e wheat 9388 1 ball contrast f guacamole 4420 1 ball contrast g dark leaf 9523 1 ball measurement approx 47 119 5 cm diameter week 1 pdf 1 1 https //cdn shopify com/s/files/1/0711/5132/1403/files/rhc0502-36856m-week_1 pdf _gl=1*1dby6ya*_gcl_au*mtazndaymdq2oc4xnzizmdewmzqy*_ga*mtg1ode2otc1mc4xnzizmdewmzqy*_ga_fnzyknerbs*mtcymzi4odq0mc4yljeumtcymzi4ody2oc40ms4wljiwmju2mtcynte *_ga_pxd53ew8l5*mtcymzi4odq0ms4yljeumtcymzi4ody2os40ms4xlje1ntc4njg2mzi
